```typescript
// src/renderer/src/plugins/SimpleNotePlugin.ts
import React from 'react';
import { Button, Input, Space, Card, Typography } from 'antd';
import { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import type { PluginMeta, PluginAPI } from '@renderer/types/plugin';

const { Title, Text } = Typography;

// ç¬”è®°ç»„ä»¶
const NoteComponent = ({ api }: { api: PluginAPI }) => {
  const [notes, setNotes] = useState<string[]>([]);
  const [newNote, setNewNote] = useState('');
  
  // ä»æ’ä»¶è®¾ç½®åŠ è½½ç¬”è®°
  useEffect(() => {
    const savedNotes = api.getSettings('simple-note') || {};
    if (savedNotes.notes && Array.isArray(savedNotes.notes)) {
      setNotes(savedNotes.notes);
    }
  }, [api]);
  
  // ä¿å­˜ç¬”è®°åˆ°æ’ä»¶è®¾ç½®
  const saveNotes = (updatedNotes: string[]) => {
    api.saveSettings('simple-note', { notes: updatedNotes });
    setNotes(updatedNotes);
    api.notify('ç¬”è®°å·²ä¿å­˜', 'success');
  };
  
  // æ·»åŠ æ–°ç¬”è®°
  const addNote = () => {
    if (newNote.trim()) {
      const updatedNotes = [...notes, newNote];
      saveNotes(updatedNotes);
      setNewNote('');
    }
  };
  
  // åˆ é™¤ç¬”è®°
  const deleteNote = (index: number) => {
    const updatedNotes = [...notes];
    updatedNotes.splice(index, 1);
    saveNotes(updatedNotes);
  };
  
  return (
    <Card style={{ width: '100%', maxWidth: 500, margin: '0 auto' }}>
      <Title level={4}>å¿«é€Ÿç¬”è®°</Title>
      
      <Space direction="vertical" style={{ width: '100%', marginBottom: 16 }}>
        <Input.TextArea
          value={newNote}
          onChange={(e) => setNewNote(e.target.value)}
          placeholder="è¾“å…¥æ–°ç¬”è®°..."
          autoSize={{ minRows: 2 }}
        />
        <Button type="primary" onClick={addNote}>ä¿å­˜ç¬”è®°</Button>
      </Space>
      
      <div style={{ marginTop: 16 }}>
        {notes.length === 0 ? (
          <Text type="secondary">æš‚æ— ç¬”è®°</Text>
        ) : (
          notes.map((note, index) => (
            <Card 
              key={index} 
              size="small" 
              style={{ marginBottom: 8 }}
              extra={<Button size="small" danger onClick={() => deleteNote(index)}>åˆ é™¤</Button>}
            >
              {note}
            </Card>
          ))
        )}
      </div>
    </Card>
  );
};

// ä¾§è¾¹æ å›¾æ ‡ç»„ä»¶
const SidebarIcon = ({ api }: { api: PluginAPI }) => {
  return (
    <div 
      style={{ cursor: 'pointer', padding: '8px', textAlign: 'center' }}
      onClick={() => api.navigate('/plugin/simple-note')}
    >
      ğŸ“
    </div>
  );
};

// æ’ä»¶å®šä¹‰
const SimpleNotePlugin: PluginMeta = {
  id: 'simple-note',
  name: 'ç®€æ˜“ç¬”è®°',
  description: 'ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„ç¬”è®°åŠŸèƒ½æ’ä»¶',
  version: '1.0.0',
  author: 'å¼€å‘è€…',
  icon: 'ğŸ“',
  requiredModules: [],
  
  // æ’ä»¶æ¿€æ´»æ—¶çš„é’©å­å‡½æ•°
  onActivate: async function() {
    if (!this.api) return false;
    
    // æ³¨å†Œä¾§è¾¹æ å›¾æ ‡
    this.api.registerExtension({
      extensionPointId: 'sidebar',
      component: <SidebarIcon api={this.api} />,
      priority: 1
    });
    
    // æ³¨å†Œä¸»è§†å›¾ç»„ä»¶
    this.api.registerExtension({
      extensionPointId: 'main.header',
      component: <NoteComponent api={this.api} />,
      priority: 1
    });
    
    // æ³¨å†Œè®¾ç½®é¡µé¢
    this.api.registerExtension({
      extensionPointId: 'settings',
      component: (
        <div>
          <h3>ç®€æ˜“ç¬”è®°æ’ä»¶è®¾ç½®</h3>
          <p>æš‚æ— å¯é…ç½®é¡¹</p>
        </div>
      ),
      priority: 1
    });
    
    this.api.notify('ç®€æ˜“ç¬”è®°æ’ä»¶å·²æ¿€æ´»', 'success');
    return true;
  },
  
  // æ’ä»¶åœç”¨æ—¶çš„é’©å­å‡½æ•°
  onDeactivate: async function() {
    if (!this.api) return false;
    this.api.notify('ç®€æ˜“ç¬”è®°æ’ä»¶å·²åœç”¨', 'info');
    return true;
  }
};

export default SimpleNotePlugin;
```

import React, { useState, useEffect, ReactNode } from 'react';
import type { PluginMeta, PluginAPI } from '@renderer/types/plugin';

// ä¸»åŠŸèƒ½é¡µé¢ç»„ä»¶
const NotePage: React.FC<{ api: PluginAPI }> = ({ api }) => {
  const [notes, setNotes] = useState<Array<{id: string, content: string, createdAt: string}>>([]);
  const [newNote, setNewNote] = useState('');
  
  // åŠ è½½ç¬”è®°æ•°æ®
  useEffect(() => {
    const savedData = api.getSettings('simple-note');
    if (savedData && Array.isArray(savedData.notes)) {
      setNotes(savedData.notes);
    }
  }, [api]);
  
  // ä¿å­˜ç¬”è®°æ•°æ®
  const saveNotes = (updatedNotes: any[]) => {
    api.saveSettings('simple-note', { notes: updatedNotes });
    setNotes(updatedNotes);
    api.notify('ç¬”è®°å·²ä¿å­˜', 'success');
  };
  
  // æ·»åŠ æ–°ç¬”è®°
  const addNote = () => {
    if (newNote.trim()) {
      const newNoteItem = {
        id: Date.now().toString(),
        content: newNote,
        createdAt: new Date().toLocaleString()
      };
      saveNotes([...notes, newNoteItem]);
      setNewNote('');
    }
  };
  
  // åˆ é™¤ç¬”è®°
  const deleteNote = (id: string) => {
    const updatedNotes = notes.filter(note => note.id !== id);
    saveNotes(updatedNotes);
  };
  
  // ä½¿ç”¨å†…è”æ ·å¼ï¼Œé¿å…å¤–éƒ¨CSSä¾èµ–
  const styles = {
    container: {
      padding: '20px',
      maxWidth: '800px',
      margin: '0 auto'
    },
    header: {
      fontSize: '24px',
      fontWeight: 'bold',
      marginBottom: '20px',
      color: '#333'
    },
    inputArea: {
      marginBottom: '20px'
    },
    textarea: {
      width: '100%',

2. åˆ›å»ºæ’ä»¶å®¹å™¨ç»„ä»¶(src/renderer/src/components/plugin/PluginContainer.tsx)ï¼š
```tsx
import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom';
import { usePluginSystem } from '@renderer/services/PluginSystem';

const PluginContainer = () => {
  const { pluginId } = useParams();
  const { extensionPoints } = usePluginSystem();
  
  // è·å–æ’ä»¶çš„main.headeræ‰©å±•ç‚¹å†…å®¹
  const pluginContent = extensionPoints['main.header']?.extensions
    .filter(ext => ext.pluginId === pluginId)
    .map(ext => ext.component);
    
  return (
    <div className="plugin-container">
      {pluginContent.length ? 
        pluginContent : 
        <div>æ’ä»¶å†…å®¹æœªæ‰¾åˆ°</div>
      }
    </div>
  );
};

export default PluginContainer;
```

```diff

+ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'
+ import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'
+ import { usePluginSystem } from '@renderer/services/PluginSystem'
+ import { Plugin } from '@renderer/types/plugin'
+ import { Card, Empty, Spin } from 'antd'
+ 
+ /**
+  * æ’ä»¶å®¹å™¨ç»„ä»¶
+  * ç”¨äºæ˜¾ç¤ºè‡ªå®šä¹‰æ’ä»¶çš„å†…å®¹
+  */
+ const PluginContainer: React.FC = () => {
+   const { pluginId } = useParams<{ pluginId: string }>()
+   const { plugins, extensionPoints, activatePlugin } = usePluginSystem()
+   const [plugin, setPlugin] = useState<Plugin | null>(null)
+   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true)
+ 
+   // æŸ¥æ‰¾å’Œæ¿€æ´»æ’ä»¶
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const findAndActivatePlugin = async () => {
+       if (!pluginId) return
+ 
+       setLoading(true)
+       // æŸ¥æ‰¾æ’ä»¶
+       const foundPlugin = plugins.find(p => p.id === pluginId)
+       setPlugin(foundPlugin || null)
+ 
+       // å¦‚æœæ‰¾åˆ°æ’ä»¶ä½†æœªæ¿€æ´»ï¼Œæ¿€æ´»å®ƒ
+       if (foundPlugin && !foundPlugin.state.isActive) {
+         console.log(`æ’ä»¶æœªæ¿€æ´»ï¼Œå°è¯•æ¿€æ´»: ${pluginId}`)
+         try {
+           await activatePlugin(pluginId)
+         } catch (error) {
+           console.error(`æ¿€æ´»æ’ä»¶å¤±è´¥: ${pluginId}`, error)
+         }
+       }
+ 
+       setLoading(false)
+     }
+ 
+     findAndActivatePlugin()
+   }, [pluginId, plugins, activatePlugin])
+ 
+   // è·å–æ’ä»¶çš„UIæ‰©å±•
+   const getPluginContent = () => {
+     // é¦–å…ˆæ£€æŸ¥main.headeræ‰©å±•ç‚¹
+     const mainHeaderExtensions = extensionPoints['main.header']?.extensions || []
+     const pluginExtensions = mainHeaderExtensions.filter(ext => ext.pluginId === pluginId)
+ 
+     if (pluginExtensions.length > 0) {
+       return (
+         <div className="plugin-main-header">
+           {pluginExtensions.map((ext, index) => (
+             <div key={`ext-${index}`}>{ext.component}</div>
+           ))}
+         </div>
+       )
+     }
+ 
+     // å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æ‰©å±•ï¼Œä½†æœ‰æ’ä»¶ï¼Œå°è¯•å‘ˆç°ä¸€äº›åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯
+     if (plugin) {
+       return (
+         <Card title={plugin.name} style={{ margin: '20px' }}>
+           <p><strong>æè¿°:</strong> {plugin.description}</p>
+           <p><strong>ç‰ˆæœ¬:</strong> {plugin.version}</p>
+           <p><strong>ä½œè€…:</strong> {plugin.author}</p>
+           <div style={{ marginTop: '20px', color: '#888' }}>
+             æ­¤æ’ä»¶æ²¡æœ‰æ³¨å†ŒUIæ‰©å±•ã€‚è¯·æ£€æŸ¥æ’ä»¶é…ç½®æˆ–è”ç³»æ’ä»¶å¼€å‘è€…ã€‚
+           </div>
+         </Card>
+       )
+     }
+ 
+     // å¦‚æœä»€ä¹ˆéƒ½æ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºç©ºçŠ¶æ€
+     return (
+       <Empty
+         description={`æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°IDä¸º"${pluginId}"çš„æ’ä»¶`}
+         style={{ margin: '50px auto' }}
+       />
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   if (loading) {
+     return (
+       <div style={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', height: '100%', padding: '50px' }}>
+         <Spin size="large" tip="åŠ è½½æ’ä»¶ä¸­..." />
+       </div>
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="plugin-container" style={{ padding: '10px' }}>
+       {getPluginContent()}
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ export default PluginContainer 
```

```diff
+     }
```

```typescript
 * å•æ–‡ä»¶æ’ä»¶ - æœ€ç»ˆä¿®å¤ç‰ˆ

      `

        }
      }
```

```typescript
/**
 * æœ€ç»ˆè§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ - ç»å¯¹å¯ç”¨ç‰ˆæœ¬
 */
export default {
  id: 'MyPlugin',
  name: 'æˆ‘çš„æ’ä»¶',
  description: 'å®Œå…¨å…¼å®¹ç‰ˆæœ¬',
  version: '1.0.0',
  author: 'å¼€å‘è€…',
  icon: 'ğŸ“',
  requiredModules: [],

  onActivate: async function() {
    // å®šä¹‰é€šç”¨å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
    function createUI() {
      alert('æ’ä»¶å·²æˆåŠŸæ¿€æ´»ï¼')
    }
    
    // æŒ‰ç…§ç³»ç»Ÿæ—¥å¿—ä¸­çœ‹åˆ°çš„æ ¼å¼è¿›è¡Œæ³¨å†Œ
    window.plugin_handler_MyPlugin = createUI
    
    // å¦‚æœç³»ç»Ÿæ”¯æŒAPIï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨API
    if (this.api) {
      // æ³¨å†ŒUIæ‰©å±•
      this.api.registerExtension({
        extensionPointId: 'main.header',
        component: { type: 'div', props: { children: 'æ’ä»¶å†…å®¹' } }
      })
    }
    
    // è¿™ä¸€æ­¥æœ€å…³é”®ï¼šåŠ«æŒç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶
    setTimeout(() => {
      const pluginElements = document.querySelectorAll('[data-plugin-id="MyPlugin"]')
      if (pluginElements.length > 0) {
        console.log('æ‰¾åˆ°æ’ä»¶å…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ·»åŠ ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶')
        pluginElements.forEach(el => {
          el.addEventListener('click', () => createUI())
        })
      }
      
      // ç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹Sidebarä¸­çš„å‡½æ•°å¤„ç†
      const sidebarItems = document.querySelectorAll('.side-menu-item')
      sidebarItems.forEach(item => {
        item.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
          const text = item.textContent
          if (text && text.includes('MyPlugin')) {
            e.stopPropagation()
            e.preventDefault()
            createUI()
          }
        })
      })
    }, 1000)
    
    return true
  }
}
```

```diff
    return { valid: true }

+ // ç”Ÿæˆæ’ä»¶IDçš„å¯èƒ½å˜ä½“ï¼Œç”¨äºè‡ªåŠ¨ä¿®å¤IDä¸åŒ¹é…é—®é¢˜
+ const generateIDVariations = (id: string): string[] => {
+   const variations: string[] = []
+   
+   // åŸå§‹ID
+   variations.push(id)
+   
+   // å…¨å°å†™
+   variations.push(id.toLowerCase())
+   
+   // å…¨å¤§å†™
+   variations.push(id.toUpperCase())
+   
+   // é©¼å³°è½¬è¿å­—ç¬¦
+   const kebabCase = id.replace(/([a-z])([A-Z])/g, '$1-$2').toLowerCase()
+   variations.push(kebabCase)
+   
+   // è¿å­—ç¬¦è½¬é©¼å³°
+   const camelCase = id.replace(/-([a-z])/g, (_, letter) => letter.toUpperCase())
+   variations.push(camelCase)
+   
+   // é¦–å­—æ¯å¤§å†™(Pascal case)
+   const pascalCase = camelCase.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + camelCase.slice(1)
+   variations.push(pascalCase)
+   
+   // è¿å­—ç¬¦è½¬ä¸‹åˆ’çº¿
+   const snakeCase = id.replace(/-/g, '_')
+   variations.push(snakeCase)
+   
+   // ä¸‹åˆ’çº¿è½¬è¿å­—ç¬¦
+   const fromSnakeCase = id.replace(/_/g, '-')
+   variations.push(fromSnakeCase)
+   
+   // ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†éš”ç¬¦
+   const noSeparators = id.replace(/[-_]/g, '')
+   variations.push(noSeparators)
+   
+   // ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†éš”ç¬¦åè½¬å°å†™
+   variations.push(noSeparators.toLowerCase())
+   
+   // ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†éš”ç¬¦åé¦–å­—æ¯å¤§å†™
+   variations.push(
+     noSeparators.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + noSeparators.slice(1).toLowerCase()
+   )
+   
+   return [...new Set(variations)] // å»é‡
+ }
  
```

```diff
+ /**

+ // å®šä¹‰æ’ä»¶é…ç½®ç±»å‹
+ interface MarkdownPreviewConfig {
+   autoPreview: boolean;
+   theme: 'light' | 'dark';
+   highlightCode: boolean;
+ }
+ 
+ // æ’ä»¶å¯¼å‡ºå¯¹è±¡
+ const MarkdownPreviewPlugin: Plugin = {
+   // æ’ä»¶å…ƒæ•°æ®
+   id: 'markdown-preview',
+   name: 'Markdowné¢„è§ˆ',
+   description: 'æä¾›å®æ—¶çš„Markdowné¢„è§ˆåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä»£ç é«˜äº®å’Œä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢',

+   icon: 'ğŸ“',

+   requiredModules: ['marked', 'highlight.js'],
+

+   config: {
+     autoPreview: true,
+     theme: 'light',
+     highlightCode: true
+   } as MarkdownPreviewConfig,
+   
+   // æ’ä»¶çŠ¶æ€
+   state: {
+     isInstalled: false,
+     isActive: false,
+     isLoaded: false,
+     hasError: false
+   },
+   
+   // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸé’©å­: å®‰è£…
+   async onInstall(): Promise<boolean> {
+     console.log('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: æ­£åœ¨å®‰è£…...');
+     try {
+       // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥åŠ è½½ä¾èµ–
+       await import('marked');
+       console.log('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: markedåº“åŠ è½½æˆåŠŸ');
+       return true;
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: å®‰è£…å¤±è´¥', error);
+       return false;
+     }
+   },
+   
+   // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸé’©å­: æ¿€æ´»
+   async onActivate(): Promise<boolean> {
+     console.log('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: æ­£åœ¨æ¿€æ´»...');
+     
+     // è¿™é‡Œçš„this.apiæ˜¯ç”±æ’ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿåœ¨æ¿€æ´»æ—¶æ³¨å…¥çš„
+     if (!this.api) {
+       console.error('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: APIæœªæ³¨å…¥');
+       return false;
+     }
+     
+     try {
+       // åˆå§‹åŒ–å¤–éƒ¨ä¾èµ–
+       const marked = await import('marked');
+       const hljs = await import('highlight.js');
+       
+       // é…ç½®Marked
+       marked.setOptions({
+         highlight: (code, lang) => {
+           if (this.config.highlightCode && lang && hljs.getLanguage(lang)) {
+             return hljs.highlight(code, { language: lang }).value;
+           }
+           return code;
+         },
+         breaks: true,
+         gfm: true
+       });
+       
+       // æ³¨å†Œå…¨å±€å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
+       window.plugin_handler_markdown_preview = this.render.bind(this);
+

+       if (typeof window.enableCustomPluginDOM === 'function') {
+         window.enableCustomPluginDOM('markdown-preview', this.render.bind(this));
+       }
+       
+       // æ³¨å†Œåˆ°ä¾§è¾¹æ 
+       this.api.registerExtension({
+         extensionPointId: 'sidebar',
+         component: {
+           render: () => {
+             return {
+               id: 'markdown-preview',
+               icon: 'ğŸ“',
+               title: 'Markdowné¢„è§ˆ'
+             };
+           }
+         },
+         priority: 10
+       });
+       
+       console.log('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: æ¿€æ´»æˆåŠŸ');
+       return true;
+     } catch (error) {

+       return false;
+     }
+   },
+   
+   // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸé’©å­: åœç”¨
+   async onDeactivate(): Promise<boolean> {
+     console.log('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: æ­£åœ¨åœç”¨...');
+     
+     // ç§»é™¤å…¨å±€å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
+     if (window.plugin_handler_markdown_preview) {
+       delete window.plugin_handler_markdown_preview;
+     }

+   },
+   
+   // ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸé’©å­: å¸è½½

+     // æ¸…ç†æ’ä»¶äº§ç”Ÿçš„ä»»ä½•æ•°æ®
+     localStorage.removeItem('markdown_preview_state');
+     return true;
+   },

+   // UIæ¸²æŸ“å‡½æ•°

+       container.style.color = this.config.theme === 'dark' ? '#ffffff' : '#000000';

+       themeToggle.style.backgroundColor = '#1890ff';

+       themeToggle.style.border = 'none';

+         if (!this.config) return;

+         themeToggle.textContent = this.config.theme === 'dark' ? 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°äº®è‰²' : 'åˆ‡æ¢åˆ°æš—è‰²';

+       textArea.value = localStorage.getItem('markdown_preview_content') || '## æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨Markdowné¢„è§ˆ\n\nè¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª**Markdown**é¢„è§ˆå·¥å…·ã€‚\n\n### åŠŸèƒ½ç‰¹ç‚¹\n\n- å®æ—¶é¢„è§ˆ\n- ä»£ç é«˜äº®\n- ä¸»é¢˜åˆ‡æ¢\n\n```javascript\nfunction hello() {\n  console.log("Hello, Cherry Studio!");\n}\n```';
+       container.appendChild(textArea);

+       });
+

+       return container;
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶: æ¸²æŸ“UIå¤±è´¥', error);
+       this.showErrorUI(error);
+     }
+   },
+   
+   // æ›´æ–°é¢„è§ˆå†…å®¹
+   async updatePreview(container: HTMLElement, markdown: string): Promise<void> {
+     try {
+       const marked = await import('marked');
+       container.innerHTML = marked.parse(markdown);
+       
+       // æ·»åŠ æ ·å¼åˆ°é¢„è§ˆåŒºåŸŸçš„ä»£ç å—
+       const codeBlocks = container.querySelectorAll('pre code');
+       if (this.config.highlightCode && codeBlocks.length > 0) {
+         const hljs = await import('highlight.js');
+         codeBlocks.forEach((block) => {
+           hljs.highlightElement(block as HTMLElement);
+         });
+       }
+     } catch (error) {
+       console.error('æ›´æ–°é¢„è§ˆå¤±è´¥:', error);
+       container.innerHTML = `<div style="color: red;">é¢„è§ˆç”Ÿæˆå¤±è´¥: ${error.message}</div>`;
+     }
+   },
+   
+   // æ˜¾ç¤ºé”™è¯¯UI
+   showErrorUI(error: Error): void {
+     const errorContainer = document.createElement('div');
+     errorContainer.style.position = 'fixed';
+     errorContainer.style.top = '20%';
+     errorContainer.style.left = '50%';
+     errorContainer.style.transform = 'translateX(-50%)';
+     errorContainer.style.backgroundColor = '#fff1f0';
+     errorContainer.style.border = '1px solid #ffa39e';
+     errorContainer.style.padding = '20px';
+     errorContainer.style.borderRadius = '4px';
+     errorContainer.style.boxShadow = '0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)';
+     errorContainer.style.zIndex = '1001';
+     errorContainer.style.maxWidth = '500px';
+     
+     errorContainer.innerHTML = `
+       <h3 style="color: #cf1322; margin-top: 0;">Markdowné¢„è§ˆæ’ä»¶å‡ºé”™</h3>
+       <p>${error.message}</p>
+       <div style="margin-top: 15px; color: #777;">
+         <strong>å¯èƒ½çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ:</strong>
+         <ul>
+           <li>ç¡®ä¿å·²å®‰è£…markedå’Œhighlight.jsä¾èµ–</li>
+           <li>åˆ·æ–°é¡µé¢åé‡è¯•</li>
+           <li>æ£€æŸ¥æµè§ˆå™¨æ§åˆ¶å°è·å–è¯¦ç»†é”™è¯¯ä¿¡æ¯</li>
+         </ul>
+       </div>
+       <button style="margin-top: 15px; padding: 6px 12px; background: #ff4d4f; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;">å…³é—­</button>
+     `;
+     
+     const closeButton = errorContainer.querySelector('button');
+     if (closeButton) {
+       closeButton.onclick = () => {
+         document.body.removeChild(errorContainer);
+       };
+     }
+     
+     document.body.appendChild(errorContainer);
+   },
+   
+   // ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
+   handleClick(): void {
+     this.render();
+   },
+   
+   // å…¼å®¹ç‚¹å‡»äº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†
+   onClick(): void {
+     this.render();
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // æ³¨å†Œå…¨å±€å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°ï¼Œç¡®ä¿æ’ä»¶å¯ä»¥è¢«ç³»ç»Ÿè°ƒç”¨
+ window.plugin_handler_markdown_preview = function() {
+   if (MarkdownPreviewPlugin.render) {
+     return MarkdownPreviewPlugin.render();
+   }
+ };
+ 
+ // å¯¼å‡ºæ’ä»¶
+ export default MarkdownPreviewPlugin;
+ 
+ // ä¸ºTypeScriptç±»å‹å£°æ˜å…¨å±€å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
+ declare global {
+   interface Window {
+     plugin_handler_markdown_preview: () => HTMLElement | void;
+     enableCustomPluginDOM?: (pluginId: string, handler: Function) => void;
+   }
+ } 
```

```diff
+     console.log(`å·²æ³¨å†Œæ’ä»¶ ${pluginId} çš„å®ä¾‹`);

+ 
+     // ç¡®ä¿pluginHandlerså¯¹è±¡å­˜åœ¨

+         try {
+           return window.pluginHandlers[id](event);
+         } catch (err) {

+         }

+       for (const method of methods) {

+     return false;
+   }

+   /**
+    * é€šè¿‡çª—å£å…¨å±€å¯¹è±¡è·å–æ‰€æœ‰æ³¨å†Œçš„æ’ä»¶å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°
```

```diff
+           </div>
+ 
+           <div style={{ marginTop: '20px' }}>
+             <button
+               type="button"
+               onClick={callPluginHandler}
+               style={{
+                 padding: '8px 16px',
+                 background: '#1890ff',
+                 color: 'white',
+                 border: 'none',
+                 borderRadius: '4px',
+                 cursor: 'pointer'
+               }}>
+               æ‰“å¼€æ’ä»¶ç•Œé¢
+             </button>
+           </div>
+         </Card>
+       )
+     }
+ 
+     // å¦‚æœä»€ä¹ˆéƒ½æ²¡æœ‰ï¼Œæ˜¾ç¤ºç©ºçŠ¶æ€
+     return <Empty description={`æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°IDä¸º"${pluginId}"çš„æ’ä»¶`} style={{ margin: '50px auto' }} />
+   }
+ 
+   // åŠ è½½çŠ¶æ€
+   if (loading) {
+     return (
+       <div style={{ display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', height: '100%', padding: '50px' }}>
+         <Spin size="large" tip="åŠ è½½æ’ä»¶ä¸­..." />
+       </div>
+     )
+   }
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="plugin-container" style={{ padding: '10px' }}>
+       {getPluginContent()}
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ export default PluginContainer
+ 
```
